item.title: Re: Best way of getting referrals?
item.content:encoded: Spamming forums will likely get you banned. I've had good success posting regularly in the World of Warcraft forums with my link in my signature. By posting regularly, I mean posting in normal topics with normal discussions about WoW.

item.title: Re: Best way of getting referrals?
item.content:encoded: try telling your friends about the game , best way i know of.

item.title: Best way of getting referrals?
